planetarian ?the reverie of a little planet?
http://www.insani.org/planetarian.html
this is the Game CD & will install the Japanese version
included also is the Full English translation patch made by Insani! ----
The unceasing Rain??
The ?sealed city?, abandoned 30 years ago after a biochemical warhead bombardment.
The uninhabited ruins, ruled over now by autonomous combat drones.
And in their midst, a single tall building, rising like a magical tower in the darkness.
The NATIONS shall crumble;
The RAIN shall fall;
And the JUNKERS shall inherit the EARTH.

I recommend this shit. Key's stuff always brings me to tears. Except the Air anime, that shit was pretty messed up.

Will be seeding for a long time.
